shadow.name: ADDICTION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Return, expressing through addiction

gift.name: RATIONALIZATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Return, expressing through rationalization

siddhi.name: SILENCE
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Return, expressing through silence

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 24 shadow frequency. The addiction you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural rationalization. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from addiction to rationalization.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your ajna. Notice the sensation of addiction.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 24 consciously for 7 days, the addiction pattern will shift toward rationalization.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 24 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from addiction toward rationalization
